Text: RE UBS Customer References Cc Our original agreement with UBS Nevin Goran was that selected customer references would be permitted shortly before signing We would not want to allow this so early in the process when there is still some weeks to signing and the Banks have not obtained final credit approval I have spoken to Nevin and reminded him of this understanding and he agrees that introducing uncertainty in the market this far ahead of signing is not beneficial for either the buyer or the seller He will speak to Jason Perkins and explain Amit Original Message From Umanoff Adam Sent Monday June PM To Amit NRON Cc Metts Mark Horton Stanley Gates Bob Miller Michael Subject UBS Customer References Attached is a short list of recommended US customer references These four customers account for the bulk of our order book and we think provide a good crosssection of people for UBS to speak with I will wait to hear back from you before releasing this list to UBS Also there are a number of other customers who if I were UBS I would want to speak with including investors in our projects other than FPL who as a group are not all that happy and some of the other US developers We should anticipate requests to speak with those entities as well Adam File customerreferencesdoc
